title: Rosena Allin-Khan – 2022 Comments on the Resignation of Liz Truss
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Rosena Allin-Khan, the Labour MP for Tooting, on Twitter on 20 October 2022.
content: The Conservative Party has lost all authority to lead Britain. They’re wrecking the country.
Keir Starmer is ready to govern, Labour are ready to govern. We need a General Election, now.
